docs.lead_paragraph: Wayne Castonguay, the executive director of the Ipswich River Watershed Association, says it may take the area a decade or more to recover.

headline.main: Business Owner, 2 Firms Face Visa Fraud Charges
headline.print_headline: Business Owner, 2 Firms Face Visa Fraud Charges

docs.snippet: Federal prosecutors in New Jersey said Monday the part-owner of two information technology firms and an employee fraudulently used a visa program to reduce skilled labor costs....
docs.lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors in New Jersey said Monday the part-owner of two information technology firms and an employee fraudulently used a visa program to reduce skilled labor costs.

headline.main: Armed Men Kill Soldier, Civilian in Mali's Timbuktu: Army
headline.print_headline: Armed Men Kill Soldier, Civilian in Mali's Timbuktu: Army

docs.snippet: An army spokesman says armed men in Mali's northern city of Timbuktu have killed a soldier and his cousin....
docs.lead_paragraph: An army spokesman says armed men in Mali's northern city of Timbuktu have killed a soldier and his cousin.

headline.main: Pair of Friends Piloted Planes That Crashed in NY, Killing 3
headline.print_headline: Pair of Friends Piloted Planes That Crashed in NY, Killing 3

docs.snippet: Authorities say two small airplanes that collided and crashed in western New York were piloted by friends who'd taken off with four other planes for their usual weekend outing....
docs.lead_paragraph: Authorities say two small airplanes that collided and crashed in western New York were piloted by friends who'd taken off with four other planes for their usual weekend outing.

headline.main: Egypt's Sisi Promises More Jobs to Deter Perilous Migration to Europe
headline.print_headline: Egypt's Sisi Promises More Jobs to Deter Perilous Migration to Europe

docs.snippet: President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi on Monday pledged more jobs for Egyptians to help dissuade them from making dangerous voyages to Europe after more than 160 migrants died when a boat capsized off the country's Mediterranean coast....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi on Monday pledged more jobs for Egyptians to help dissuade them from making dangerous voyages to Europe after more than 160 migrants died when a boat capsized off the country's Mediterranean coast.

headline.main: Islamic State Militants Kills 5 Civilians in Egypt's Sinai
headline.print_headline: Islamic State Militants Kills 5 Civilians in Egypt's Sinai

docs.snippet: Egyptian officials say Islamic State militants have killed five Egyptian civilians and dumped their bodies, wearing orange jumpsuits, in a restive corner of the Sinai Peninsula....
docs.lead_paragraph: Egyptian officials say Islamic State militants have killed five Egyptian civilians and dumped their bodies, wearing orange jumpsuits, in a restive corner of the Sinai Peninsula.

headline.main: U.S. Senator Seeks SEC Probe of Yahoo Disclosure on Hacking
headline.print_headline: U.S. Senator Seeks SEC Probe of Yahoo Disclosure on Hacking

docs.snippet: Democratic Senator Mark Warner on Monday asked the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to investigate whether Yahoo and its senior executives fulfilled obligations to inform investors and the public about a hacking attack affecting 500 million...
docs.lead_paragraph: Democratic Senator Mark Warner on Monday asked the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to investigate whether Yahoo and its senior executives fulfilled obligations to inform investors and the public about a hacking attack affecting 500 million user accounts.

headline.main: BofA to Pay $15.5 Million Fines for Causing 'Mini-Flash Crashes'
headline.print_headline: BofA to Pay $15.5 Million Fines for Causing 'Mini-Flash Crashes'

docs.snippet: Bank of America Corp agreed to pay a total of $15.5 million in fines to settle charges by U.S. regulators and exchanges that lapses in its Merrill Lynch unit's risk controls disrupted trading in 15 stocks, leading to "mini-flash crashes."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Bank of America Corp agreed to pay a total of $15.5 million in fines to settle charges by U.S. regulators and exchanges that lapses in its Merrill Lynch unit's risk controls disrupted trading in 15 stocks, leading to "mini-flash crashes."

headline.main: Worrall to Get Australian ODI Debut
headline.print_headline: Worrall to Get Australian ODI Debut

docs.snippet: Australia fast bowler Daniel Worrall will make his one-day international debut in Tuesday's one-off match against Ireland at Willowmore Park in Benoni, South Africa, captain Steve Smith said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Australia fast bowler Daniel Worrall will make his one-day international debut in Tuesday's one-off match against Ireland at Willowmore Park in Benoni, South Africa, captain Steve Smith said on Monday.
